td.content: s:a 44 YO female pilot complains of severe cough, severe fever, severe shortness of breath and Respiratory and other medical problems. NKDA. she does not smoke she is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 62 in, Weight 175 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 65, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, CT Chest demonstrates areas of centriacinar emphysema, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, actively coughing with sputum production - dark yellow, Neck = no JVD a:Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease p:administered salmeterol - 50 mcg (inhaled) 2xday, performed CT Chest, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:pt presents with 7 months history of Liver. she is a white female pilot aged 44 Ys. o:Height 61 in, Weight 173 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 65, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Hepatitis C p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:female pilot aged 44 yrs with Liver. she has had several such episodes over past 2 years. consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 62 in, Weight 180 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 66, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Hepatitis C p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Orthotopic liver transplantation - liver.

td.content: s:patient presents with Liver. she is having symptoms 19 x week, in spite of treatment. she is a white female aged 45 ys. o:Height 62 in, Weight 175 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, Liver biopsy-FNA Cyto Lymphocytic infiltration, moderate degrees of inflammation and necrosis, and portal fibrosis a:Hepatitis C p:administered Interferon alfa-n1 - 10 mg tab, performed Liver biopsy-FNA Cyto, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
